definition: small waxy white or pinkish-white saprophytic woodland plant having scalelike leaves and a nodding flower
details:
noun
- small waxy white or pinkish-white saprophytic woodland plant having scalelike leaves and a nodding flower
- epiphytic clusia of British Guiana
- twining woody vine of Madagascar having thick dark waxy evergreen leaves and clusters of large fragrant waxy white flowers along the stems
